about_the_game:
The main role of music for The House of Da Vinci was to create dark, yet intriguing ambient music, which immediately takes you into the immersive world of being Leonardo’s apprentice.

By combining synth pads and acoustic instruments and some periodic instruments such as Viola da Gamba.
The whole soundtrack evolves around the main motive, which serves the purpose of being a guide throughout the game.
